elements.name: Cloning a repository and checking its state

steps.name: it fails to clone a non-existent repository

result.errorMessage:
Synchronous test failed. Stderr: Cloning into 'invalid-repo'...
remote: Repository not found.
fatal: repository 'https://github.com/user/invalid-repo.git/' not found

steps.name: it successfully clones a valid repository
the git log contains the initial commit
